title: SCAM ALERT! $1,200 / 2 br Furnished
posting_body: THERE ARE FRAUDULENT ADDS POSTED FOR THIS CONDO.
I OWN THIS CONDO AND RENT IT FOR $2,800 PER MONTH LOW SEASON.
THE SCAM ADD ADVERTISES IT FOR A GREATLY REDUCED PRICE.
IF IT SOUNDS TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE, IT PROBABLY IS.
REPORT THE ADD TO CRAIGSLIST AND THE PHONE NUMBER OF THE PERSON WHO ANSWERS THE ADD TO THE POLICE.
Just 15 minutes from downtown located in a pool community your dream home awaits.3 bed 2 bath 1314 SF Ranch home has a 1car garage & sits on a corner lot.
Home features a wood burning fireplace, kitchen w/open shelving & quartz countertops.
Wood floors in entry, hall & kitchen.
Updated Master bath, new carpet throughout.
Check out the large screened-in porch &workshop w/electricity.
